stories.original_headline: Scientists discover protein that rejuvenates aging brain cells
stories.original_summary: A newly identified protein may hold the key to rejuvenating aging brain cells. Researchers found that boosting DMTF1 can restore the ability of neural stem cells to regenerate, even when age-related damage has set in. Without it, these cells struggle to renew and support memory and learning. The fin
stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Uncover Elixir to Restore Elder Minds!
stories.fantasy_story: The Royal Alchemists' Guild has brewed a potent new elixir. This magical draught can restore the fading wisdom and memory of even the oldest scholars. It helps ancient minds regenerate, ensuring their vast knowledge is not lost to time.

stories.original_summary: Tenways just launched its new CGO Compact electric bike in Europe that's designed to fit into tight spaces like car trunks, apartment hallways, and train compartments. To achieve this, the CGO Compact is fitted with small 20-inch wheels, folding pedals, and a handlebar fitted with a twistable stem t
stories.fantasy_headline: Tenways Guild Unveils New Folding Mechanical Steed!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Tenways Guild of Artisans has revealed a marvelous new mechanical steed. This enchanted contraption can twist and fold itself flat, making it perfect for stashing in small carriages or tight lord's chambers. Its clever design allows swift travel and easy storage.
